title: Add tool preset system for quick workflow switching
description:
**As a** Consoul power user
**I want** predefined tool presets (readonly, development, safe-research)
**So that** I can quickly switch between common workflows without manual configuration

**Context:**
Users often need different tool sets for different workflows:
- Code review: read-only tools (grep, code_search, read_file)
- Development: file editing + execution (bash, create_file, edit_file_lines)
- Research: web + search tools (web_search, read_url, grep)
- Safe mode: only SAFE risk level tools

Tool presets provide named configurations that can be loaded via CLI or config.

Similar patterns:
- aider: .aider.conf.yml presets
- llm: model aliases and saved options
- tmux: named sessions

**Technical Notes:**
- src/consoul/config/models.py - Add ToolPreset model
- src/consoul/config/models.py - Add tool_presets dict to ConsoulConfig
- Built-in presets (hardcoded defaults)
- User presets (defined in config.toml)
- CLI flag: --preset readonly
- Config reference: preset = "development"
- Presets expand to tool lists during initialization

Built-in presets:
- readonly: ["grep_search", "code_search", "find_references", "read_file", "read_url", "web_search"]
- development: ["bash", "grep_search", "code_search", "create_file", "edit_file_lines", "edit_file_search_replace"]
- safe-research: ["web_search", "wikipedia_search", "read_url", "grep_search", "code_search", "read_file"]
- power-user: [] (all tools)

**Acceptance Criteria:**

**Given** I run consoul tui --preset readonly
**When** TUI initializes
**Then** only read-only tools from the preset are registered

**Given** I have a custom preset defined in config
**When** I run consoul tui --preset my-workflow
**Then** tools from my custom preset are registered

**Given** I request an invalid preset
**When** I run consoul tui --preset invalid
**Then** I get error with list of available presets (built-in + custom)

**Given** I define a preset in config
**When** I view consoul preset list
**Then** I see both built-in and custom presets

**Testing Considerations:**
- Test all built-in presets
- Test custom user presets
- Test invalid preset name (error handling)
- Test preset list command
- Test CLI override of config preset
- Validate preset definitions

**Implementation Hints:**
1. Add ToolPreset model:
   ```python
   class ToolPreset(BaseModel):
       name: str
       description: str
       tools: list[str]  # Tool names or "all" for all tools
   ```
2. Add to ConsoulConfig:
   ```python
   tool_presets: dict[str, ToolPreset] = Field(
       default_factory=dict,
       description="Custom tool presets (in addition to built-in)",
   )
   ```
3. Define built-in presets in constants
4. Add --preset CLI flag
5. Add consoul preset list command
6. Expand preset to tool list during initialization
7. Document in sample config with example custom preset

**Example config.toml:**
```toml
[tool_presets.my-workflow]
description = "My custom workflow"
tools = ["bash", "grep_search", "create_file"]
```

**Dependencies:**
- SOUL-154 (Use allowed_tools for registration)
- SOUL-155 (--tools CLI flag for similar parsing logic)
